content: last row 1 more time buttonhole row chain 1 single_crochet 8 *chain 3 skip 3 single_crochet 11 repeat from * to last 6 6 10 10 14 14 sts chain 3 skip 3 single_crochet to end turn next row chain 1 single_crochet across working 3 single_crochet in each chain-3-space turn work 2 more row of single_crochet fasten_off neckband with rs facing join color b to top corner of right front chain 1 single_crochet evenly around neck edge turn row 2 chain 1 single_crochet across turn row 3 chain 1 single_crochet 2 chain 3 skip 3 for button hole single_crochet around neckline working decrease twice in both curves of the u-neck and twice at both shoulders turn row 4 chain 1 single_crochet across working 3 single_crochet in chain-3-space turn row 5 chain 1 single_crochet around neckline working decrease twice in both curves of the u-neck and twice at both shoulders turn row 6 chain 1 single_crochet across turn row 7 repeat row 5 fasten_off bottom edging with rs facing join color b to bottom of left front work 1 row of single_crochet evenly across bottom edge turn next row chain 1 single_crochet across turn © 2009 julia vaconsin juliavaconsin@gmail com repeat last row 5 more times bottom of sleeves with rs facing join color b to bottom of sleeve at sleeve seam work 1 row of single_crochet evenly around edge turn 64 68 74 80 86 94 sts next row chain 1 single_crochet in next 2 1 1 1 1 2 sts *decrease single_crochet 1 repeat from * to last 2 1 1 1 1 2 sts single_crochet 2 1 1 1 1 2 turn 44 46 50 54 58 64 sts next row chain 1 single_crochet across turn repeat last row 4 more times fasten_off repeat the same for other sleeve close seams of sleeve cuffs weave in ends block again to smoothen out edges sew on buttons opposite button holes copyright 2009 by julia vaconsin this
